SEARCH
Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.hotelapplication.backend.Database
public class Database extends Object
The Database class represents an in-memory storage for managing hotel and user data. It provides methods for adding, removing, and retrieving hotel and user information. This implementation will eventually be replaced with actual database calls.
Author:
Alexander Boutselis

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Database()
    Constructs a new Database object, initializing the lists for hotels and users.

    • removeHotel

      public void removeHotel(String hotelName)
      Removes a hotel from the database by matching its name.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - The name of the hotel to be removed.

    • setCurrentHotel

      public void setCurrentHotel(Hotel hotel)
      Sets the current hotel being managed.
      Parameters:
      hotel - The Hotel object to set as the current hotel.

    • getCurrentHotel

      public Hotel getCurrentHotel()
      Gets the current hotel being managed.
      Returns:
      The current Hotel object.

    • getHotel

      public Hotel getHotel(String searchHotelName)
      Gets a hotel from the database by its name.
      Parameters:
      searchHotelName - The name of the hotel to be searched.
      Returns:
      The Hotel object if found, otherwise null.

    • getHotel

      public Hotel getHotel(int hotelID)
      Gets a hotel from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      hotelID - The ID of the hotel to be searched.
      Returns:
      The Hotel object if found, otherwise null.

      Returns:
